SELECT GEN_REVIEW_ID, GEN_CONFIRMED_ID, RATING, REVIEWED_DATE , POINT, POINT_SUBJECT, USED_TIME, PAR_READ_DATE FROM GEN_REVIEWS WHERE GEN_REVIEW_ID = #{gen_review_id}

SELECT DISTINCT GMT.TYPE AS TYPE FROM GEN_MULTIPLE_REVIEWS GMR JOIN GEN_MULTIPLE_TYPES GMT ON GMR.GEN_MULTIPLE_TYPE_ID = GMT.GEN_MULTIPLE_TYPE_ID JOIN GEN_REVIEWS GRV ON GRV.GEN_REVIEW_ID = GMR.GEN_REVIEW_ID JOIN gen_confirmed GC ON GRV.GEN_CONFIRMED_ID = gc.gen_confirmed_id JOIN GEN_REQ GQ ON GC.GEN_REQ_ID = GQ.GEN_REQ_ID JOIN GEN_REG GR ON GQ.GEN_REG_ID = GR.GEN_REG_ID JOIN SIT_BACKUP S ON S.SIT_BACKUP_ID = GR.SIT_BACKUP_ID WHERE S.SIT_BACKUP_ID = #{sit_backup_id}
